title: Application of Learning Analytics-Based Clustering for Customized e-Learning Design

context.additional_context: Establishment of a customized learning support environment to enhance job competencies for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learner types can be classified into three categories—slow learners, average learners, and advanced learners—based on learning behavior data.
The clustering results derived from learning analytics can be applied to the design of personalized learning pathways.
An assessment strategy based on the revised Bloom's taxonomy can utilize a learner diagnostic and feedback system.

resources: Learning Progress and Time Data Collection Module

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
